name: One is All
description:
Although your life may end, your essence lives on in that which consumes you. Keep moving, and you shall one day break the cycle, and ascend. 

So basically, humans eat birds, birds eat flowers, and flowers poison humans and then eat them too.

This is One is All, my entry into the third Extra Credits Game Jam. Any and all comments/feedback are greatly appreciated!

Controls:

Human - Left and right arrow keys to move, spacebar to jump

Bird - Left and right arrow keys to move, spacebar to flap

Flower - Spacebar to "grow" in whichever direction is held down. One hint: hold up and mash the spacebar.

Credits:

  • The cave background is from opengameart.org, from user PWL. URL here: https://opengameart.org/content/seamless-cave-background
  • The background music is from freesound.org. The track name is "My love", and the artist name is Shady Dave. The song can be found here: https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/325611/
  • The cave tiles are from opengameare.org, from user Buch. Artist page can be found here: https://opengameart.org/users/buch

Known bugs/issues: 

  • Collision detection between sprites is wonky sometimes.
  • Player starts the game by heading directly to left sometimes, with no input. Press the left arrow to return him to normal.
